title: NIR-responsive magnesium phosphate cement loaded with simvastatin-nanoparticles with biocompatibility and osteogenesis ability
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,13958-13971
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01079E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bin Wang, Yanbin Zhao, Yangyang Li, Junyan Yao, Shunjie Wu, Guoping Miu, Chenglin Chu
In this article, we reported a specific magnesium phosphate bone cement which showed good physical, chemical properties, and excellent osteogenesis-promoting ability under near-infrared light intervention.
